text: I don't think people are particularly obsessed. It's just that it's one of those things where it's easy for everyone to have an opinion, while at the same time being an issue with pros and cons on both sides. So everyone can chime in, and will chime in

text:

but many people miss to acknowledge this, claiming one is vastly superior to anything else

text: Sometimes it’s easier to count fenceposts.  Sometimes it’s easier to count segments from the start of the fence.  Fin.

text:
> but many people miss to acknowledge this, claiming one is vastly superior to anything else
Can you imagine using a language without arbitrary indexing? Must be horrible! :julia-troll:
